hits.Title: Geometry Arrow
hits.Description: Dive into an exhilarating journey through a treacherous cave! Your mission: reach the portal at the end of each level while avoiding deadly spikes and obstacles. With six progressively harder levels, you’ll need sharp reflexes and spot-on timing to survive. Can you conquer every challenge and make it out of the cave? Put your skills to the test in this high-speed action game!
hits.Instructions:
PC controls:
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON or SPACEBAR ─ arrow movement

MOBILE controls:
TOUCHING THE SCREEN ─ arrow movement

hits.Title: Park Me
hits.Description: Park Me is a game of moving cars out of the parking lot. In the game, there will be many cars parked in the parking lot. First of all, the outermost cars must be moved out, and the corresponding exits and barriers of each car must be observed. The car in front finally saved the car.
hits.Instructions: Every level is different, with real surprises and fun challenges.The situation around the entire parking lot requires you to check and not to encounter other vehicles.

hits.Title: Fireboy and Watergirl 2 Light Temple
hits.Description: This time, Fireboy and Watergirl (made by Oslo Albet), are exploring the Light Temple. Use the temple light to reach the exit safely. Switch between Fireboy & Watergirl, but be careful, Fireboy cannot touch water and Watergirl cannot touch fire.
hits.Instructions: Move with WASD and the arrow keys.On mobile you can change controls in the options menu.

hits.Title: Motor Tour
hits.Description: In Motor tour, the ultimate racing game, you'll experience an unforgettable adrenaline-pumping adventure with multiple modes to choose from. Take on fierce competitors, embark on an endless journey, or take things up a notch by daringly weaving through traffic with heart-stopping near misses. Don't wait any longer, start playing now and immerse yourself in this epic experience that is sure to leave you on the edge of your seat!
hits.Instructions:
W = forward
A = Left
D = Right
S = Brake

Shift = Nitro
ESC = Back

-Upgrade your motor for an edge over your competition.
-Play online or endless mode for more cash.
-Watch ads for quick boosts in cash, gold, or blueprints.
-Drive in the opposite direction for bonus points, but be careful not to crash!
hits.Key Features:
Varied Game Modes: Endless highways, career missions, time trials, free runs, and real-time multiplayer races.
Customizable Bikes: Upgrade and personalize over 40 unique motorcycles.
Dynamic Environments: Realistic weather and time-of-day changes.
Real-Time Multiplayer: Compete in exciting PvP races.
Realistic Physics: Authentic bike handling and driving experience.
Multiple Controls: Options for tilt, buttons, or steering wheel.
Unlimited Play: No fuel or time limits.
Diverse Traffic: Encounter trucks, buses, and SUVs.
Nitrous Boosts: Enhance your speed in multiplayer races.
Active Community: Connect and share with fellow racing enthusiasts.

hits.Title: Water Color Sort
hits.Description:
Icon image
Water Color Sort
About this game
? Water Sort is a simple, fun and addictive sort puzzle game.
? Your next task is to sort the colored water in the cup until all the colors in the glass are the same. The game is easy to get used to, but it is difficult to become an expert and there are 1000 puzzles to challenge you.
? A challenging yet relaxing game to train your brain!
hits.Instructions:
★ HOW TO PLAY
- Touch any glass bottle to pour water into another bottle.
The rule is that you can only pour water into another bottle if it is linked to the same color and there is enough space on the glass bottle.
- Do your best and don't get stuck. Don't worry, you can always start over at any time. Or use the help to add a new message.
hits.Key Features:
★ FEATURES
- Easy one-finger control.
- More than 1000 unique and continuously increasing levels
- All free

hits.Title: Geometry Vibes
hits.Description: Geometry Vibes is a reaction-based arcade game where you avoid obstacles, traps and spikes that come at you in waves. Your goal in the game is to keep your arrow on the route and take it as far as possible. The game includes a classic mode with levels, a race mode (2-3-4 players) where you can do multiple races, and an endless mode where you can test yourself! Geometry Vibes, where the excitement never ends, invites you to challenge...
hits.Instructions:
Click to "MOUSE LEFT-CLICK" or "UP ARROW" and hold to fly up.
Release the button to dive down.
In 2,3,4 Player game modes, other players are controlled with "UP ARROW", "H" and "L".

hits.Title: Traffic Tour
hits.Description: Traffic Tour is an endless arcade racing game offering a smooth driving experience with realistic graphics. Choose your favorite racing car, navigate through traffic, and challenge players in real-time multiplayer mode. Complete 100 online missions, beat opponents, and enjoy 1v1 matches with friends. With a great car racing system (CRS), this is one of the best free racing games.
hits.Instructions:
- Control instructions : 
 W = forward        D = Right         L = Left          S = Brake         Shift = Nitrous         ESC = Back

- Unlock new cars by collecting more Blueprints in endless mode
- When driving over 100 km/h, try to overtake traffic cars to get bonus scores and cash
- Get extra cash when endless mode 
- Driving in opposite direction in two-way gives extra score and cash
hits.Key Features:
- Unlimited car racing play - No fuel or time limits 
- Multiple control modes: tilt, buttons or steering wheel 
- 5 gameplay modes: Multiplayer, Endless, Career, Time Trial, Free Run – 
- 100 missions in career mode 
- 5 realistic environments: Highway, City, Desert, Rain and snow with day or night times – 
- 40 different cars with the ability to customize colors and wheels
- Upgrade cars features: Speed, Handling, and Brakes
- Multiplayer racing, challenging friends and players from all around the world.

hits.Title: Crunch Lock
hits.Description: Many wrenches collaborate to create a sophisticated, synchronized performance with many screws in this captivating voyage. This task requires deft sequencing and quick synchronization. Put yourself in the shoes of the unscrewing virtuoso and navigate through a series of heart-pounding trials, injecting each step with an unmatched elegance.
hits.Instructions: In this captivating adventure, multiple wrenches choreograph an intricate dance with numerous screws, demanding both nimble coordination and ingenious sequencing. Assume the role of the maestro of unscrewing, infusing each section with an unmatched flair and surging ahead through a series of heart-pounding challenges.

Show your three-in-a-row puzzle skills and challenge other players in tournaments. Constantly earn bonuses by completing daily tasks. Play with your friends or other players around the world.

hits.Title: Golf Orbit
hits.Description:
One shot golf simulator is the battle of golf rivals to become the golf king worldwide. Become part of this idle golf orbit rocket league in which balls go high to Mars. Smash the ball to mars and become the golf champions.

Oneshot Golf Orbit is golf offline game which has many golf rocket leagues and one shot golf battles. Be part Mars golf games to become champions of golfing over it.
hits.Instructions: The key to Golf Orbit is to aim and hit the golf ball as far as possible. This one-button game has relatively easy gameplay, but getting that perfect shot can be challenging. Tap your left mouse at the right time to set the power and hit the ball. As the ball soars, it bounces off various objects, gaining extra distance. Your distance will be recorded with each shot, keeping you accountable for your progress. The goal is to achieve the longest distance possible with each swing.

hits.Title: Goods Master 3D

hits.Title: BlockBuster Puzzle

hits.Instructions:

2) Select blocks of different shapes from the options.
3) Put the chosen block into the grid.
4) Complete rows or columns to blast them.
5) More rows or columns blasted, higher the score.
6) Plan block placement to maximize blasts.
7) Aim for the highest score with no more move.

hits.Title: Solitaire Classic
hits.Description: The most popular card game in the world, classic Solitaire, also known as Patience, is a great way to relax and train your brain. With beautiful graphics, fun animations, new features, custom backgrounds and offline play - Solitaire by Albayoo is the ideal game for the best casual gaming experience, however, most importantly – this online strategy game helps TRAIN YOUR BRAIN and KEEP YOUR MIND SHARP!
hits.Instructions: Tap or drag cards to arrange them in descending order with alternating colors. When you can, move cards up to the foundation to sort all of the suits from Ace to King. You can draw one card at a time for a more relaxing game, or draw three for a challenge to train your brain!
hits.Key Features:

hits.Title: Block Dropping Merge
hits.Description:
Block Dropping Merge is a special but classic number merge puzzle. It's easy to play but hard to master.
Show us how good you are among other puzzlers!

1024 2048 4096 8192 16384... Drop them numbers and merge to get bigger numbers and show how smart you are!

Play and share your best score now!
hits.Instructions:
- You will be given numbers to play and count
- Drop the number block at bottom or beside to merge
- Keep merging to avoid losing the game!
- If it is too tricky, check your next number block and plan your next move!
hits.Key Features:
- Game will let you know the next number puzzle blocks

hits.Title: Ludo Hero

hits.Instructions: Roll the Ludo dice and move your tokens to reach the center of the Ludo board. Beat other opponents and become the king of Ludo in this multiplayer game.

Dive into the parkour adventure with Obby in the Hell Tower game theme. Climb colored platforms and get to the finished platform for a great reward.
The game contains three hell tower maps easy, medium, and hard. Play these maps in two different modes normal mode and challenge mode. Try to do your best timing in challenge mode in either single-player or 2 player game mode. You can also compete against your friend in normal mode in the 2-player game mode option.
hits.Instructions:
In Single Player Game mode:
Move: W,A,S,D or ARROW KEYS
Jump: SPACE
Sprint: L-SHIFT

In 2 Player Game mode:
Player 1:
Move: W,A,S,D
Jump: SPACE

Player 2:

hits.Title: Wild West Match 2: The Gold Rush
hits.Description: Wild West Match 2 immerses you in the thrilling Gold Rush era of the Wild West! Match three or more gold nuggets, cowboy hats, horseshoes, and other treasures to earn points and unlock new levels. Use Dynamite to clear obstacles or reveal hidden gold! With hundreds of challenging levels, you’ll dig through the Wild West to find hidden treasures and secrets. Ready to strike it rich? Join the Gold Rush adventure now!
hits.Instructions: In Wild West Match 2, match three or more items like gold nuggets, cowboy hats, and horseshoes to score points and reach level goals. Use Dynamite to clear obstacles or uncover hidden gold. Each level has specific objectives—complete them before you run out of moves! Plan your moves wisely to make the most of boosters and power-ups. Keep digging through hundreds of levels to discover more treasures in the Gold Rush!

hits.Title: Athena Match
hits.Description: Embark on a mythical journey in Athena Match, a Match 3 game set in Ancient Greece. Guided by the goddess Athena, match three or more identical artifacts to clear levels and uncover Greek secrets. Stunning visuals and rich soundscapes bring this world to life as you solve puzzles and overcome mythical obstacles inspired by Greek lore. Ready to prove your skills? Join Athena and dive into the adventure!
hits.Instructions: Match three or more identical artifacts to clear them from the board. Each level has a specific goal, such as collecting certain artifacts or clearing obstacles. You have a limited number of moves to complete the task, so plan carefully! Use special boosters and Athena's guidance to help you overcome tough challenges. Keep an eye out for unique obstacles inspired by Greek mythology. Match wisely and progress through levels to unlock more of the legendary world!

hits.Instructions: In this bubbles game for soccer fans, you must kick the colorful soccer balls to sort them into clusters of three or more of the same type. This will cause the bubbles to pop and vanish. Can you shoot with the precision of a soccer star taking a perfect shot at the goal? Match up the country flags and try to reach a record score!

hits.Title: Mahjong Connect Deluxe
hits.Description: "Mahjong Connect Deluxe" is a classic puzzle game inspired by the renowned Chinese tile removal game, Mahjong. Your task is to eliminate all the tiles on the board by connecting identical tiles to remove them. However, each connection can't involve more than 2 turns. With 18 challenging levels to conquer, your objective is to finish each level before time runs out to earn extra bonus points. Dive into this tile-matching adventure and test your skills!
hits.Instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

Once the 9x9 slots are all Filled up, the blocks in it will be cleared!
Achieve high score by clearing many combos at once!
hits.Instructions:
As you start the game, you will see nine 3x3 slot boards and three different patterned blocks on the bottom.
If you fill vertical or horizontal 9 slots with given blocks, or fill 3x3 slots, you gain points.
When there is no more space to fill with given blocks, the game stops and you get final records.

It is the game of combination of Tetris and Sudoku game.
You may need some few steps to get used to the game but once you get it, you will enjoy the game until the end of your luck and logic ability. Eventually, you will feel more hardship than Tetris, but easier than Sudoku.

hits.Title: Slice it All

Can you make it?

hits.Title: Wonders of Egypt Mahjong
hits.Description: Wonders of Egypt Mahjong transports you to the mystical world of Ancient Egypt in this brand-new Solitaire Mahjong game. Play through beautifully designed hand-drawn tiles featuring Egyptian motifs and captivating backgrounds inspired by the wonders of Egypt. With 40 unique new layouts and three smaller tutorial layouts, it’s perfect for both beginners and Mahjong experts. Dive into hours of challenging gameplay and uncover the secrets of the Pharaohs!
hits.Instructions: Find and match identical tiles, making sure they’re free on at least one side to remove them from the board. Clear all tiles to complete each layout and unveil the mysteries of Egypt! Use Shuffle, Torch, or Hint if you’re stuck, and earn stars as you progress through endless puzzles. Relax and enjoy the beauty of Ancient Egypt in this captivating Solitaire Mahjong journey!

hits.Title: Tile Guru Match Fun
hits.Description:
Train your brain and calm your mind while playing one of the best zen match games! Play this puzzle every day for 10 minutes to improve your memory and sharpen your mind.

This next-level tile match game is designed to turn you into a tile master!! Add this daily practice to your zen planner and get ready for a triple match challenge. It's your personal boombox of matching puzzle games with a gradually increasing level of difficulty!
hits.Instructions:
1) Launch the game. Tiles appear on the screen.
2) Find and tap three identical, open tiles.
3) Identical tiles vanish in sets of three.
4) Continue until the board is clear.
5) Use Hints/Power-ups if stuck.
6) Complete levels by matching all the tiles.

hits.Title: Hawaii Match 5

hits.Title: Master of Numbers
hits.Description:

Skillful dodging obstacles and choosing the best route will allow you to reach the finish line and score the maximum number of points. Time to test your dexterity and strategic thinking in this unique and addictive game!

hits.Title: Match Adventure

Meet the colorful and fun match-3 game - start your exciting journey together with Gemmy the squirrel!

One day, waking up, the inhabitants of the forest found that at night someone has destroyed the entire forest edge and now it is in desolation. But what's even worse - the brother of Gemmy the squirrel, Johnny, has disappeared. Help a small but brave squirrel to find her brother!

The path will not be easy – you, along with Gemmy, need to talk to all the forest inhabitants, restore the events of last night and go on an adventure to other worlds. You, Gemmy and her friends will travel from one world to another, learn new details about the mysterious disappearance of her brother and other characters and get acquainted with the inhabitants of other worlds.

hits.Key Features:

As you progress through the levels, Gemmy will communicate with various characters, and reveal the secret of what happened. After completing some levels, Gemmy and the travelers will receive a reputation and reward, as well as a part of a secret mechanism that will help them get to the next world.

Buy new decorations in the store for coins and increase the reputation of the world! Do not forget to clear the territory to make room for new buildings. To do this, you will need nuts. And to speed up the process - use diamonds!

hits.Title: Helix Jump
hits.Description:
Helix Jump is a game with simple and addictively fun mechanics. In the game, you guide a bouncing ball continuously down a series of circular platforms. Fall through the cracks and avoid landing in the forbidden zones!

This is a simple yet challenging game with harmonious and colorful interface to provide players with a comfortable visual experience.

Features:
One-tap easy-to-learn controls, rich visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics.
hits.Instructions:
Put a finger on the screen and move it left to right to rotate the helix structure. You don’t move the ball that is on the screen, just the platforms that rotate around a central pole.

Move the platforms so the ball falls through openings. It can bounce on the platforms, but you cannot bounce on the red.

Score more points by going through multiple openings at once. If you go through three or more, you can land on a red platform spot as it will break the platform.

hits.Title: Ludo Online
hits.Description:
Ludo is a strategy board game for two to four players, in which the players race their four tokens from start to finish according to the rolls of a single dice.

The game has 3 modes:

- Online: Playing with randomly matched people.
- Private: Playing with your friends. Simply share a private code and connect to each other.

Have fun with your friends! Play now!

hits.Title: Mahjong Connect Gold
hits.Description: Mahjong Connect Gold is an exciting puzzle game with captivating gameplay that is known to all fans of the Mahjong series. Collect all the tiles by matching their pairs according to the rules of classic Mahjong. Immerse yourself in Mahjong's unique world and dive into this captivating puzzle's depths!
hits.Instructions:
The rules of the game are like in classic Mahjong, and playing is easy:
- Click on two identical tiles. They will disappear if the selected pair can be connected by three lines (or fewer).
- To pass the level, you must clear all identical tiles this way.
hits.Key Features: Thousands of unique levels, beautiful skins and tiles, simple rules.

hits.Title: 11x11 BLOXX
hits.Description: 11+11 Bloxx," also known as "11x11 Blocks," is a captivating block-puzzle game that distinguishes itself by employing an 11x11 game board instead of the traditional 10x10 grid. In this game, your objective is to strategically position multi-colored polyomino shapes onto the board to accumulate coins and points by forming rows and columns comprised of precisely 11 blocks.
hits.Instructions: Assess the three distinct shapes at your disposal. Strategize the initial placement for one of them. Relocate the remaining two shapes accordingly. Evaluate the upcoming set of shapes and position them to create partial lines. Execute skillful combination moves, aligning multiple lines simultaneously. Aim to maximize your earnings in terms of coins and points.
hits.Key Features:
The game board showcases a captivating arrangement of dark, purplish-blue blocks, forming an intricate checkerboard pattern. Unlike many other 10x10 puzzle games, "11+11 Bloxx" introduces a unique element by presenting various patterns across 12 distinct levels. Some of these patterns incorporate blocks resembling immovable stones, which pose a challenge as they obstruct the creation of 11-block lines. Nonetheless, the game compensates by awarding you coins and points for eliminating smaller lines in these scenarios.

Progressing in the game requires you to conquer one level to unlock the next. While it's possible to remove lines one at a time, opting for combination moves to clear multiple lines simultaneously earns you higher point rewards.

11+11 Bloxx" enriches the block-puzzle experience with several enhancements. The coins you earn can be wisely invested in power-ups, extending your gameplay by increasing available space on the board. These power-ups grant you the ability to swap two blocks, eliminate individual blocks, clear groups of blocks by type, or remove a specified quantity of blocks. The game introduces these power-up options when you run out of moves, or you can access and purchase them using the lightning bolt button.

Furthermore, your accumulated coins unlock the option to acquire diverse block types, including round blocks, blocks adorned with stripes, and flat tiles. This diversity in block types adds an additional layer of strategic depth to your gameplay.

Gray means no letters are matching, Yellow means letter is matching but not right position, and Green means right letter, right position.

The objective of the game is to be first to bear off, i.e. move all fifteen checkers off the board.

hits.Title: Dig This

There is often a trick to solve the levels, sometimes you need to take advantage of the objects' speed, sometimes you need to make objects collide, but often it is enough to use your intuitive thinking.

Can you make it?

hits.Instructions: The game's objective is simple—sink as many basketball shots as you can with a single click. In the first round, you're perched on top of a skyscraper, aiming for a single hoop. hits.Title: Pop Blocks

Addictive match 3 game genre game in style of famous Facebook franchise, featuring easy game play, and cute music for player to come back for good time.
Basic Tap on two or more items of the same color to destroy them.
Easy game mechanics, make every one happy!
​
hits.Instructions:
Jelly - absorbs any boxes in a random order. Does not move when objects fall. Can be removed after destroying any boxes nearby. In this case, the block doesn’t expand.
Toy - destroy all obstacles in the path of this item to win.
hits.Key Features:
Bonus items:
Rocket Bonus Items
Tap 5 items the same color to create a ROCKET bonus item.
ROCKET destroys vertical or horizontal rows on the game field.
Bomb Bonus Items
Tap 6 items the same color to create a BOMB bonus item. 
BOMB destroys 9 game items around.
Pinwheel Bonus Items
Tap 9 or more items the same color to create a PINWHEEL bonus item. PINWHEEL destroys all game items the same color. Just tap on it.

Neutral box - has 3 levels. Does not move when objects fall. Will be destroyed after destroying any items near this block.
When you choose the goal of the game to destroy colored boxes, you will see an icon common to all colors.
Neutral ball - Moves from place when objects fall. Will be destroyed after destroying any items near this block.
Colored boxes - Moves from place when objects fall. Will be removed after destroying items of the same color near the blocks.
When you choose the goal of the game to destroy colored boxes, you will see an icon common to all colors
Cage - keeps an item inside. Can be remove after destroying this item.
Bubble box- Does not move when objects fall. Can be removed after destroying an item inside. 
Aquarium - Unbreakable. Destroy the main objects near the aquarium to get a fish.
Snail - has 2 levels. Destroy the main objects near to get the snail.
Boosters
Rocket - destroys vertical or horizontal rows on the game field.
Bomb - destroys 9 game items around.
Pinwheel- destroys all game items the same color. Just tap on it. 
Hammer destroys one item on the game field.
Torpedo destroys one horizontal raw.
Pot destroys one vertical column.
Randomize shuffles the main game objects.
Extra Moves adds 5 steps after a loss so that the player can continue the game

hits.Title: Animal Link
hits.Description: Animal Link is a puzzle game, the goal is to remove all the squares by eliminating the same pattern. The rules of the game are simple and require a certain amount of observation and quick reaction ability.
hits.Instructions:
1. Connection: Connect two lines with the same pattern
2. Turn: The cable changes direction at the turn
3. Obstacles: Other blocks block two lines of the same pattern
4. Countdown: You need to complete the level within the specified time, or the game will fail
5. Tips: If you can't find a matching square, you can use the tips function to get some help
hits.Key Features:
1. Experiment with varying tactics: Clearing one square might simplify connections for others. Focus on the optimal sequence of removal to reduce the number of obstacles.
2. Pay attention and retain memory: At times, it's necessary to recall the locations of certain blocks that are potential matches but currently not connectable. Through careful observation and memory, you can successfully match these blocks in future moves.
3. Act swiftly: The game's time constraint demands rapid decision-making. Minimize hesitation in selecting blocks to effectively utilize the allotted time.
Through these rules, terms and techniques, you can fully enjoy the fun of Connect Animal. Challenge your powers of observation, memory, and decision-making, and try different strategies and methods to get the highest score

hits.Instructions:

Controls: swipe left / right - turn the platform with cubes; Touch - Drop the cube down

hits.Key Features:

hits.Title: Dominoes BIG
hits.Description:
The player with the highest double (double 6 therefore) begins the domino game. If no one owns this domino, it will be the player with the strongest double. The next player in turn must place a domino having the same number of points on at least one side of the previously placed domino.

To win the game, you just have to be the first player to place all your dominoes. The game may be blocked. Then the player with the fewest points is declared the winner.
hits.Instructions: Each player receives 7 dominoes or 6 dominoes depending on the number of participants in the game (7 2 player dominoes, 6 3 or 4 player dominoes). Beware! The dominoes must be distributed with the points hidden. The rest of the dominoes serve as a pickaxe.
hits.Key Features: + Leaderboards

hits.Instructions:

hits.Title: Bolts and nuts

The game Bolts and Nuts is a logic puzzle? in which you have to unscrew bolts from planks?! Your task is to choose the right bolt to unscrew? so that you can unscrew all the planks ✌!
Compete with friends and colleagues ?!
hits.Instructions:
How to play: PC
Unscrew a bolt - Select the bolt you want to unscrew and click on it with the left mouse button.
Screw a bolt - Click on the hole with the left mouse button into which you want to screw a bolt.

How to play: Smartphone
Unscrew the bolt - Select the bolt you want to unscrew by pressing on it with your finger.
Screw the bolt - Click on the hole you want to screw the bolt into.

Embark on an interstellar journey in the most thrilling puzzle game of 2025! Merge planets in a cosmic challenge and create a universe of fun.

hits.Title: Suika Kawaii Cat Merge game
hits.Description: The game is a fun, puzzle-based merging game where players control a dropper that releases animals onto the field. Players must carefully move the dropper to align and drop matching animals. When two of the same type collide, they merge into a higher-level animal. The goal is to keep merging and progressing to create new animals. Special buttons offer abilities like shaking the container or merging random animals, adding strategy and excitement to the gameplay.
hits.Instructions:
Tap and hold to move the dropper, then release to drop an animal.

Match two of the same type to merge into a higher-level animal.

Use ability buttons to shake the container or trigger random merges.

Merge animals to unlock new levels and increase your score.

Earn combo bonuses by merging quickly and efficiently.

Strategize your drops and merges to optimize progression.

Keep merging to reach higher levels and set new records!
hits.Key Features:
Addictive Merging Mechanics: Combine animals to discover new, exciting creatures.

Simple Controls: Easy tap, drag, and drop gameplay suitable for all ages.

Exciting Combo System: Chain merges to build combos and boost your score.

Unique Abilities: Use special buttons to shake the container or merge animals randomly.

Unlock New Animals: Progress and unlock a variety of adorable animals.

Challenging but Relaxing: Fun for casual play with increasingly challenging goals.

No Two Games Alike: Randomized merges and abilities keep each game unique.

hits.Title: Flag Puzzle Jam: Collect Flags
hits.Description: Immerse yourself in Flag Jam, a unique blend of puzzle-solving, flags collecting, and visual ASMR effects! The navigation in this is very simple.
Just use mouse on desktop or your finger tap on mobile devices.
hits.Key Features:
- Simple & Addictive Gameplay: Just tap on a banner piece, and it will automatically move to its correct spot. Complete each flag with the right pieces!
- Strategic Puzzle Solving: Plan each tap carefully – if you fill up all slots with the wrong pieces, you’ll lose the level. Focus on matching pieces to clear the board!
- Complete Flags to Progress: Each level challenges you to complete flags by finding and matching all the correct pieces.
- Collect & Display Flags: Unlock national symbols from various countries around the world as you complete levels. Build your own banner collection in the Avenue of Flags!

hits.Title: Cards 21
hits.Description:
Cards 21 is a very addictive strategy card game. If you like solving puzzles or playing classic card games such as Solitaire, Spades, etc. then Cards 21 is for you!

How to play the game?
It is an easy-to-play game in which you get 3 lives. The player gets four platforms where he/she needs to place the cards. The player needs to place the cards in such a way that the sum total makes 21 in each column. Sounds easy? Isn't it?

But let us unfold the twist too.
The player can use a maximum of 5 cards only in order to add up to 21 otherwise he will lose a life. He can also lose if the grand total of the cards becomes more than 21.

The good part of the game is that there is no time boundation.
You can also get extra points with our additional features!
This simple card game will puzzle your mind for hours of enjoyment. Have a great time playing Cards 21 game. Play it NOW!
hits.Instructions: Drag and drop to place the cards.

hits.Title: Minesweeper
hits.Description:
Welcome to the world of Minesweeper, a game of mind!  Here you can challenge yourself by trying to beat the campaign of increasingly difficult levels, customize the game in every way, enjoy smooth animation and learn to play the game if you’re a beginner.

The objective of the game is to clear a rectangular board containing hidden "mines" or bombs without detonating any of them, with help from clues about the number of neighboring mines in each field. If a square containing a mine is revealed, the player loses the game. If no mine is revealed, a digit is instead displayed in the square, indicating how many adjacent squares contain mines; if no mines are adjacent, the square becomes blank, and all adjacent squares will be recursively revealed. The player uses this information to deduce the contents of other squares and may either safely reveal each square or mark the square as containing a mine.

Remember: any ship can be a minesweeper… once.
hits.Instructions: Click or tap on a square to reveal the number of mines in the adjacent squares. Detailed tutorial is included.
hits.Key Features:
+Classic and modern skins 
+Adjust the board size and difficulty for both first-time players and experts 
+Fast and smooth gameplay 
+Missions mode with a hundred levels to conquer

Most often, black and pink colors are used in clothes, mostly they are always neutral pastel colors. Of the hairstyles, this is usually two ponytails or loose hair. The tails are fixed with ribbons, as well as hairpins. Lipstick of all shades, but more often red, pink, purple. Often create gradients on the lips. Enjoy!

Cozy Merge is a nice puzzle game where you merge tiles on a board to reach one million points. Each tile has a number that doubles when merged with identical tiles. Keep placing identical tiles together to create new ones with different numbers and colors.

The game has pleasant music, design and sounds that immerse you in the experience. If you get stuck, use boosters like undo, shuffle, or doubling tiles to solve the puzzle.

Cozy Merge is easy to learn and hard to master.
hits.Instructions:
You have a field on which you need to place tiles with numbers. Place tiles with the same number next to each other to get one tile with the final number multiplied by two. As a result, you need to reach one million.

If you suddenly get stuck, then use powerful boosters: undo last move, shuffle all the tiles on the field and multiplying any tile by two.
hits.Key Features:

hits.Title: Sum Shuffle
hits.Description: Sum Shuffle is a puzzle game where players combine numbers to reach a target sum for each level. With both positive and negative numbers, players must strategically select and merge them. The game offers 50 levels, progressing in difficulty. Early levels are easy for beginners, but the complexity increases to challenge experienced puzzle enthusiasts. With smooth transitions and immersive sound effects, Sum Shuffle delivers an entertaining experience suitable for players of all ages.
hits.Instructions: In Sum Shuffle, use simple drag-and-drop controls to merge numbers on the screen. The goal is to reach the exact target sum at each level by combining positive and negative numbers. Strategic thinking is key as you progress through increasingly challenging levels. Achieving the correct sum allows you to advance, and each stage presents a new challenge. Your aim is to stay focused, manage numbers effectively, and enjoy the gradual rise in difficulty.
hits.Key Features:
Features
50 levels with increasing difficulty.
Smooth drag-and-drop controls for intuitive gameplay.
A mix of positive and negative numbers, adding strategic depth.
Smooth transitions, animations, and immersive sound effects.
Catered for players of all ages, promoting both relaxation and challenge.

hits.Instructions: Try to remove all the icon tiles in a limited time. All you have to do is to select an emoji's  tile (by taping on it) and then try to match this emoji to another similar one. The difficulty is that you can only connect tiles that can be linked with a maximum of 3 straight lines (and the line cannot go through any other tile).

hits.Instructions:
HOW TO PLAY:
• Tap any tube to move the ball lying on top of any tube into another tube
• The rule is that you can only move a ball on top of another ball if both of them have the same color and the tube you want to move into has enough space. Otherwise the ball is rejected.
• You can always restart the level at any time or retrace your steps one by one using the back button.

hits.Title: A2Z Connect
hits.Description:

hits.Instructions: Press the left mouse or finger (touchscreen) button to start the match. Now move the mouse on identical adjacent alphabets (Horizontally, vertically or diagonally). For example if you select 3 or more than 3 blocks labelled with 'A', the resulting letter will be the B.

hits.Title: Screw It Out Jam! - Matching Colored Screws
hits.Description: Welcome to Screw It!, a unique mobile puzzle platformer where screws are the key to solving intricate challenges. Strategically unscrew and reposition fasteners to shift, tilt, or collapse platforms in your favor. With simple tap controls and realistic physics, each level offers an addictive experience that tests your wits and reflexes. Dive into the world of Screw It! and master the art of unscrewing!
hits.Instructions:
Start Playing: The game begins automatically. You’ll jump straight into the first level.

Objective: Tap screws based on the color of the arriving toolbox.

How to Play: When a toolbox arrives, check its color. Tap screws of the same color to screw them in.

Finish the Level: Keep tapping until all screws are matched with the toolbox color.

Tips: Pay close attention to toolbox colors to match screws correctly. Enjoy the game!
hits.Key Features:
Innovative Puzzle Mechanics: Experience a fresh take on puzzle games where screws dictate the outcome of each level. Manipulate platforms by unscrewing bolts, creating chain reactions that test your strategic thinking.

Challenging Levels: Progress through increasingly difficult levels, each with unique setups and puzzles to solve. From simple platforms to intricate mechanisms, every level is a new challenge.

Dynamic Physics Engine: Powered by a sophisticated physics engine, Screw It! offers realistic interactions between screws, platforms, and gravity. Every action has a consequence, making each puzzle a test of both skill and timing.

Customizable Screws and Platforms: Unlock various screw types and platform materials as you advance. Each has its own properties, adding layers of complexity and new strategies to explore.

Engaging Visuals and Soundtrack: Enjoy a visually appealing experience with polished graphics and a soundtrack that enhances the gameplay atmosphere. Each level is designed with attention to detail, ensuring a captivating experience.

Global Leaderboards and Achievements: Compete against players worldwide, climb the leaderboards, and unlock achievements as you master the art of screwing and unscrewing. Prove that you have the best puzzle-solving skills!

Why Screw It!? Whether you're a casual gamer looking for a fun way to pass the time or a puzzle enthusiast seeking a new challenge, Screw It! offers something for everyone. The intuitive controls make it accessible, while the progressively difficult levels ensure that you'll always have a new puzzle to solve. With regular updates and new content, there's always a reason to keep coming back.

Play Screw It! now and start unscrewing your way to victory!

Keywords: Screw game, puzzle platformer, mobile game, physics puzzle, addictive gameplay, strategic puzzles, challenging levels, innovative game mechanics, mobile gaming, platformer game, casual puzzle game, physics-based puzzles, screw mechanics game.

Category: Games > Puzzle > Platformer

• Strategic Depth: Choose when and how to use boosters and bonuses to develop your own approach for conquering each level.

Unique Features

• Charming Mushrooms: These aren’t just game pieces—they’re lively characters that add personality and charm to the gameplay.

• Hundreds of Levels: The game evolves with each level, providing a steady increase in complexity to keep you hooked.

• Vibrant Graphics and Effects: Every match is accompanied by colorful animations and satisfying sound effects, making each move feel rewarding.

• Accessible Yet Challenging: The mechanics are intuitive for beginners, but the higher levels offer a strategic challenge for experienced players.

Mushroom Fever Match 3 masterfully combines vibrant visuals, engaging gameplay, and strategic depth. It’s perfect for quick gaming sessions or for those who want to dive deep into the magical forest for hours on end. Match mushrooms, unlock power-ups, and prove yourself as the ultimate puzzle solver!

hits.Description: The goal of the game is simple: break all the bottles on the screen according to the given requests in each stage. Your accuracy and timing are crucial, so pay close attention to the instructions and let the smashing begin!
hits.Instructions: Click on the bottles to destroy them.

hits.Title: Find Sort Match
hits.Description: Find Sort Match is a fun and creative puzzle that combines sort and match elements. Let you experience the joy of DIY! In the game, sort and match items of various shapes, colors, and types. And complete each level of the challenge.
hits.Instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

hits.Title: Craft World - Building Games
hits.Description: «Craft World» is the new builder simulator where everything is limited only by your imagination! Build various houses of more than 300 unique blocks and decorate the rooms with various decor and furniture!
hits.Instructions:
Movement: WASD
Mine block: Right mouse button
Place block: Left mouse button
Inventory: Q.
Action: E
Flight mode: F
Camera change: R
Hide the interface: H

hits.Title: K-pop New Years Concert 2
hits.Description: Right after midnight, the most famous K-pop band of the moment will entertain the gathering with their cool songs, and these best friends girls can’t wait to see the BlackPink girls performing. They've got the tickets, and they need the right looks, and here is where you can help them out! Get ready to prove your stylist skills, ladies, and get them the right BlackPink-inspired looks while playing the K-Pop New Year's Concert 2 dress-up game for girls online!
hits.Instructions: Use your mouse to play this game.

hits.Title: Detective - Logic Puzzles
hits.Description:
Become a Detective! Solve logic puzzles to find the criminal! 
Lots of levels and interesting stories!

You will have to solve a lot of different cases, in this you will be helped by the method of deduction known to all detectives.
hits.Instructions:
1) Use the hints to put ticks or crosses on the field.

2) When the whole field is marked, the case is solved.

3) Play the extra mode to earn clues and unlock a new story!

hits.Title: Block Puzzle - Frozen Jewel
hits.Description: An addictive block puzzle game that helps train your eyes and brain. It is a combination between the Tetris and Jewels game styles.
hits.Instructions: Drag the jewel blocks to the desired places, to form full jewel lines (horizontal or vertical) in order to blast them.
hits.Key Features:
- Global leaderboard
- 8x8 board (bigger blocks)
- Option to continue the game
- 6 languages supported: English, Russian, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Chinese

hits.Title: Storm Tower Defense - Idle Pixel War
hits.Description: Storm Tower is a classic pixel idle tower defense game. You can upgrade a variety of attributes to build unique defense spires and complete survival challenges!
hits.Instructions: Build the Spire Storm Shield and complete the Tower Defense challenge.
hits.Key Features:
⭐Tower Ability⭐
Double-shot, multi-shot, and more. unlock a variety of abilities and attributes to make the game more strategic.

⭐Monster⭐
A variety of monsters and bosses will bring you different challenges.

⭐Level⭐
With a large number of levels and maps, go to explore the unknown world.

⭐Award⭐
Gold coins, diamonds, stars and more rewards are sent for free non-stop.

⭐Collection⭐
Become a collector and collect various items, medals, monsters in the world.

⭐Survival TD Mode⭐
Randomly generate powerful monsters, the longer you survive, the more points and the higher the ranking.

Tower defense game, shot game, upgrade your tower

hits.Title: Screw Jam - Fun Puzzle Game
hits.Description:
Remove screws in correct order to get rid of the boards. 
Match the removed screws and complete the level. 
Test yourself with this amazing brain teaser!
hits.Instructions: Let's embark on a mechanical journey like no other in Screw Pin - Jam Puzzle. Your mission is to untwist screws and put them in the right screw boxes. You win when completing all the screw sets. Unscrew them all now!
hits.Key Features:
Addictive gameplay, help you relax and train your brain
ASMR Screw game: Beautiful design with satisfying in-game sounds.

hits.Title: Fix The Hoof
hits.Description: Fix The Hoof is a soothing simulation game where you take on the role of a hoof care specialist, restoring and beautifying the hooves of animals like horses, cows, and goats. Enjoy deeply satisfying ASMR moments as you clean, polish, and paint hooves in this engaging 3D experience. Earn money from your services to upgrade your farm and expand your collection of animals to care for.
hits.Instructions: Click on interactive elements on the screen using the mouse or touchpad to clean, polish, and paint hooves.
